Package controller

Class LoginForm

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is a controller for the LoginForm view. It contains the methods onUserLogin, recentAppointmentsCheck and initialize

  • Method Details

    • onUserLogin

      public void onUserLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      this method is triggered when the user attempts to log in. It checks to see if the user is valid and then writes whether the login attempt was successful to a text file named login_activity.txt. Source for writing files: https://www.w3schools.com/java/java_files_create.asp
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • recentAppointmentsCheck

      public void recentAppointmentsCheck() throws SQLException
      this method checks for recent appointments and shows an alert displaying whether there are any scheduled appointments within 15 minutes of the user's login.
      Throws:
      SQLException
